definition: abbr. for Xinjiang 新疆[Xin1 jiang1] or Singapore 新加坡[Xin1 jia1 po1]/surname Xin
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
see 鬧洞房|闹洞房[nao4 dong4 fang2]

sentences.english: They want to buy a new house, near the sea preferably.
sentences.chinese: 他們想要買一所新房子，最好是離海近些的。

sentences.english: I also invite several upfitter to look through my new apartment tonight.
sentences.chinese: 今晚，我還請了幾個裝修工去查看我了新房子。

sentences.english: They spent megabucks on the deck of their new house.
sentences.chinese: 他們在新房的裝修上花了很多錢。

sentences.english: Allieu would like to build a new house for Jusu, but he does not have the means right now.
sentences.chinese: 阿利厄想建立一個朱蘇新房子，但他沒有現在的手段。

sentences.english: They 've just purchased a new house in the country.
sentences.chinese: 他們剛地鄉下買了棟新房。

sentences.english: The doors were newer and looked more modern compared with the unpainted wooden doors of the older ones.
sentences.chinese: 新房大門和舊房子沒有油漆的木門比起來更新更時髦。

sentences.english: Please give me some bricks. I want to build a new house.
sentences.chinese: 請給我一些磚塊，我想要蓋一間新房子。

sentences.english: We planned to situate our new house in the heart of the city.
sentences.chinese: 我們計劃要把我們的新房子蓋在城市的中央。

sentences.english: I used up my money decorating my new house.
sentences.chinese: 我裝修新房子時用光了手頭的錢。

sentences.english: Yang Ling and her parents live in a new house now.
sentences.chinese: 楊玲和她的父母親住進一戶新房子。

sentences.english: Instead of pride in the new house, Mr. Luc is worried about the debt.
sentences.chinese: 阿廬沒有爲新房子感到自豪，他很擔心債務。

sentences.english: Who bought that new house down the street fron you?
sentences.chinese: 你們大街那頭的那棟新房子誰買下了？

sentences.english: They're building a new house up the street from me.
sentences.chinese: 他們正點在我住的這條大街的那一頭建一棟新房了。

sentences.english: I faint when coming to Dream Garden.
sentences.chinese: 我看到了有珠簾的新房，我暈。

sentences.english: He spent all his money on the new house.
sentences.chinese: 他把所有的錢都花在了新房子上。

sentences.english: These are the new homes for young marrieds.
sentences.chinese: 這些是新婚夫婦們的新房。

definition: second-hand house/house acquired indirectly through a middle-man
forward delivery apartment/unfinished housing to be paid for in advance by the buyer and then completed within certain time frame
house/room/CL:間|间[jian1]/branch of an extended family/classifier for family members (or concubines)
building under construction/commercial property/real estate (for sale or rent)
to decorate/interior decoration/to fit up/to renovate
configuration of rooms in a residence (e.g. 3BR 2 Bath)
